summary: This document is a collection of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019. It includes out-count forms, inmate rosters by assignment category, and official count slips, showing the location and status of inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate with registration number 76318-054, assigned to the ATTY (attorney visit) category and housed in unit 204-206LAD on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate counts and out-counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, documenting inmate locations and assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein was listed in the 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment category and was housed in unit '204-206LAD'.
The documents are routine prison administrative records (count sheets and rosters) from the day, showing the standard operation of the facility.
Other inmates are listed with various assignments including FNYS (Federal New York South), FS (Food Service), ATTY, and HOSP (Hospital).
The forms include out-counts, which document inmates who are to be excluded from the main population count, and official count slips verifying inmate numbers in specific housing units.
